about_the_game:
ULTIMATE TOOL ASSISTED BULLSHITTING KEYBOARD DESTRUCTION RHYTHM GAME

(demo)

Experience the thrill of egregiously cheating at an extremely hard 8 button rhythm game! Worried about hitting the right button? Any key on the same half of your keyboard will do. Unbelievably fast streams? Just hit them as chords, it's fine. GODHAND takes care of all that pesky "thinking" so you can concentrate on the important stuff: rapidly smashing your keyboard like a crazed gorilla.

But of course, there have to be limits to such overpowered abilities. Too many inputs will fill up the heat gauge, which *checks notes* vastly increases your score...? Who came up with this??

In this demo version, play 9 songs from GODHAND's base songlist (we're counting the tutorial because it's peak) and maybe even take out a keycap or two for free. Thank us later.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 21H1 or newer
  • Processor: x86, x64 w/ SSE2, ARM64
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10 or newer / Vulkan capable
  • Additional Notes: did you know that mechanical keyboards are probably cheaper than you think? you can find decently usable 60% keyboards for like 30 USD. not the best but you're going to demolish it anyway. you'll probably want one as a godhand controller
